thread.section_title: ezStorage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezStorage | ezstorage.com
thread.title: Tarqueenia

author: Tarqueenia
title: Tarqueenia
text: I have never seen a storage facility SO CLEAN! THE FLOORS GLEAM! The managers, Jeffery and Jonathan Lyles, are also very knowledgeable and professional. After carefully listening to my list of storage materials they were able to advise me perfectly as to the amount of storage I would need. These guys have raised the standard as to what a storage facility should be. I am totally impressed.
